CSS Setup and Selectors Int this lessonm you will learn how to set up a CSS file, and how to create CSS selectors, and how to set up CSS rule sets. 1. Intro to CSS * Cascading Style Sheets: is a language that web developers use to style the HTML content on a web page. Inline Styles html
